conbody.p: The GET /Weather endpoint allows users to retrieve current weather data for any location on Earth. It aggregates real-time data from global and local weather models, satellites, radars, and an extensive network of weather stations. The data is available in multiple formats, including JSON, XML, and HTML.
This endpoint is designed to provide detailed weather information such as temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, atmospheric pressure, cloud coverage, and visibility.
